root.name: Microscope Remote
root.description: Move your XY Stage and Focus Device with your mouse.
root.author: tprovoost - Thomas Provoost
root.changelog:
- Version 2.3.0.0 Date 2016-07-20 18:39:52
Updated for last Micro-Manager plugin.
- Version 2.2.1.0 Date 2016-02-19 18:32:08
Updated to last Micro-Manager Icy plugin version.
- Version 2.2.0.0 Date 2016-02-12 18:10:52
Updated to work with last Micro-Manager.
- Version 2.1.3.0 Date 2015-10-13 18:14:08
Updated to last Icy MM version.
- Version 2.1.2.0 Date 2014-08-22 18:05:05
Updated for last Micro Manager plugin.
- Version 2.1.1.0 Date 2014-07-15 11:34:25
Minors fixes, tweak and refactoring.
- Version 2.1.0.1 Date 2014-07-10 14:07:39
* Reverted to MicroManager main class name. * some tweaks / fixes.
- Version 2.1.0.0 Date 2014-07-03 23:00:14
Partial rewrite to be compliant with the new MicroManager plugin.
- Version 2.0.2.2 Date 2013-01-25 17:30:26
* updated to mm4icy last version
- Version 2.0.2.1 Date 2013-01-22 16:14:37
* some source files were missing, thus generated an issue with the loading.
- Version 2.0.2.0 Date 2013-01-16 11:02:23
* corrected an issue with XY Stage with 0 / 0 movement. Should work now. * updated code to Icy 1.3
- Version 2.0.1.0 Date 2012-06-26 15:52:01
Uses new StageMover from Micromanager plugin.
- Version 2.0.0.7 Date 2012-06-26 15:44:56
- Version 2.0.0.6 Date 2012-05-24 17:17:27
* Removed useless display.
- Version 2.0.0.5 Date 2012-05-24 14:32:39
Small fix concerning issues with Z focus on TI Microscope mainly, may be useful for other Focus devices.
- Version 2.0.0.4 Date 2012-05-15 15:06:21
* one previous correction disappeared, reinstated in this one.
- Version 2.0.0.3 Date 2012-05-15 14:23:02
* issue concerning auto-resizing on externalization fixed
- Version 2.0.0.2 Date 2012-04-16 14:03:26
* "java.lang.NoSuchMethodError" due to compilation error corrected.
- Version 2.0.0.1 Date 2012-04-16 13:50:03
* corrected difference between X and Y movement, Y was 10 times faster than X * Z movement is now threaded to avoid slow GUI response
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2012-01-16 11:30:59
Remote completely changed. More intuitive.
- Version 1.0.1.1 Date 2011-11-16 13:19:17
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2011-11-09 17:28:56
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2011-09-22 15:39:08
